ygData.subject: Re: Out of the Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: The blade has problems penetrating Sinnertwin s thick armour, and before it can do any dammage he spins around, lashing out with each mouth at Cledar.

The blade has problems penetrating Sinnertwin's thick armour, and before
it can do any dammage he spins around, lashing out with each mouth at
Cledar.
